detail_desc: Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top. Detachable belt at the waist with a covered buckle, a concealed zip in one side and straight, ankle-length legs.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves decorated with plastic beads.
Imitation suede ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High waist with a wide waist panel.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal side pieces and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, laser-cut edges and narrow, detachable shoulder straps. Metal fastener at the back.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top with a decorative bow and metal pendant. Base and sides in imitation suede. Lined. Size 7.5x22x17 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose crêpe weave. High waist with elastication at the back, and buttons and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Jersey-lined trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and seams at the knees.
Cotton sun hat. Lined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, textured bikini. Top with flounce trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece. Hood with appliqués and embroidery, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder, cotton poplin top with a unique nursing feature, smocking with shoulder straps at the top and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Straight-cut jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur trims at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a silk blend with stitched seams front and back.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front and side pockets.
Trousers in stretch, lightweight twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Tiered skirt in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in a fluffy jacquard knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides, cutaway coverage at the back and a low waist with covered elastication.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed waistband and mesh sections on the legs. Integral key pocket in the waistband.
Short-sleeved, printed running top with a jersey front and back made from ventilating mesh. Taped details, taped ventilation holes under the arms, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders with pleated shoulder seams and long balloon sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a slightly deeper, lace-trimmed neckline.
Low-rise leggings in stretch imitation leather with quilted details on the knees. Fake pockets with decorative zips, and a visible zip fastening at the front.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Long shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a pleat at the back and horizontal seam both front and back. Open chest pockets, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Shopper in supple imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 17x28x32.5 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Fitted jacket in a sturdy, textured-weave wool blend with frayed edges. Notch lapels, welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the front and cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs, one with a brushed metal plate.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side and circular inserts for added width at the hem. Satin lining.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and an all-over print. Detachable hood with an elasticated front edge, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Coat woven in a viscose blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Two flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Sleeveless nursing dress in chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Pleated scarf in a patterned weave that can be worn around the neck or tied as a hairband. Size 56x56 cm.
Sleeveless dress in sturdy, patterned fabric with a visible zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. The zinc in the earrings is recycled.

Jacket in fast-drying jersey with a hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring at the front. Zip, concealed side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Print motif on one sleeve.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Dressing-up shoes in glittery imitation leather with a decorative bow at the front. Strap across the foot with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, thin, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative pleats at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Baby Exclusive. Soft shoes in soft, organic cotton jersey with lacing at the front. Cotton jersey linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. Some of the cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft cotton jersey lining containing some viscose.
Long shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and one inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Wide-fitting blouse in crinkled chiffon with embroidered details. V-neck with covered buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a decorative metal ring and magnetic fastener, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x17x21 cm.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Adjustable, lace-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.2 cm.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in fine-knit cotton with a wrapover hood, terry motif on the front and short slits at the hem. Contrasting colour ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Satin jumpsuit with a gently draping wrapover front, concealed button at the front and elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip at the side and straight wide legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
